video_prompt: Golden fluid figure ascends from a rippling liquid teacup, hands pressed in greeting. Energetic golden liquid splashes swirl dynamically around the figure, emanating from the overflowing cup. Light rays subtly shift, illuminating the scene. The reflective surface beneath the cup exhibits outward-expanding concentric ripples.
image_prompt: Golden figure meditates above overflowing golden teacup, swirling liquid, deep blue background, sun rays, meditative, dynamic, serene, spiritual.
refined_video_prompt: A golden fluid figure ascends from a rippling teacup, hands expressing a welcoming greeting. Energetic golden liquid splashes and swirls dynamically, overflowing the cup and around the figure. Light rays subtly shift. Concentric ripples expand outwards on the reflective surface below.
